Class Computer

java.lang.Object
java.util.Observable
model.interactableObjects.InteractableObject
model.interactableObjects.Computer
public class Computer extends InteractableObject
computer interactable object model used to control the enemies (Drone, Dog in the room, just like in the original impossible mission.

  • Field Details

    • isBeingAccessed

      private boolean isBeingAccessed
      flag to check if the computer is being accessed or not

    • isMenuVisible

      private boolean isMenuVisible
      flag to check if the computer menu is visible or not. becomes true only if the player finishes to interact with the computer and calls open(Player).

    • menuOptions

      private String[] menuOptions
      menu options

    • selectedMenuOption

      private int selectedMenuOption
      currently selected menu option

  • Constructor Details

    • Computer

      public Computer(int x, int y)
      Parameters:
      x - x coordinate of the computer (top left)
      y - y coordinate of the computer

  • Method Details

    • open

      public void open(Player player)
      if this method is being called, then it means the player has finished interacting (searching) the computer. sets isBeingAccessed,isMenuVisible to true. sets the selectedMenuOption to 0.
      Specified by:
      open in class InteractableObject
      Parameters:
      player - current instance of the player that is trying to interact with the object

    • navigateMenuUp

      public void navigateMenuUp()
      can be used only if the computer isMenuVisible is true. selects the previous menu option

    • navigateMenuDown

      public void navigateMenuDown()
      can be used only if the computer isMenuVisible is true. selects the next menu option

    • selectMenuOption

      public void selectMenuOption(Player player)
      selects the current menu option. if option 0 is selected, deactivates all the drones in the room; if option 1 is selected, deactivates all the dogs in the room.
      Parameters:
      player - player instance

    • cancelMenu

      public void cancelMenu()
      resets the boolean flags isMenuVisible and isBeingAccessed to false

    • getIsBeingAccessed

      public boolean getIsBeingAccessed()
      Returns:
      isBeingAccessed

    • getIsMenuVisible

      public boolean getIsMenuVisible()
      Returns:
      isMenuVisible

    • getSelectedMenuOption

      public int getSelectedMenuOption()
      Returns:
      selectedMenuOption

    • getMenuOptions

      public String[] getMenuOptions()
      Returns:
      all the available menu options. menuOptions menuOptions
